name: ProjectOrientation
0:
”Alexa, open Project Orientation”
”Alexa, start Project Orientation”
”Alexa, begin Project Orientation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: project orientation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Project Orientation is a tool to determine where you stand with your project and what the challenge at hand is. It works for any project.

Lots of projects don't go well. The project orientation skill aims to fix that.

Answer four questions which takes five minutes. Then focus on the challenge as described and be more effective at work. 

Use it for your self or with your team. Also good as a discussion guide. 

Prompt Alexa as follows:
"Alexa, start project orientation"
"Alexa, open project orientation"
"Alexa, begin project orientation"

Then answer the four questions. It easy, useful and proven,
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
